title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.44 - Cleaning or maintenance of aircraft restricted to designated areas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.44 - Cleaning or maintenance of aircraft restricted to designated areas

State Regulations

Cleaning of or otherwise maintaining, repairing or
servicing aircraft shall be accomplished only in areas of the airport
designated for that purpose by the airport operator. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
79.44

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
